files.description: 28-page EHI Export Data Format specification for MDVita version 27 (Guide v1.2, dated Sep 2023, PDF created Jan 2024). Documents the complete (b)(10) EHI export format: 24 Apache Parquet data files covering patient demographics, insurance plans, appointments, clinical notes (SOAP), orders, problem lists, allergies, medications, procedures, documents, lab results, claims/encounters, referrals, internal emails, immunizations, vitals, document signatures, insurance payments/EOBs, patient charges, patient payments, and document annotations. Each file is documented with column names, data types, descriptions, and coded value enumerations. Also describes the document/SOAP note delivery mechanism via time-limited Azure Blob Storage URLs.
